sentences.en: "I don't know," Pollard replied, professing innocence.
sentences.cn: “我不知道，”波拉德回答说，谎称自己是无辜的。
克里平坚称自己是无辜的。

sentences.en: He has always protested his innocence.
sentences.cn: 他一直申辩自己是无辜的。

sentences.en: Her wide-eyed innocence soon exposes the pretensions of the art world.
sentences.cn: 她的天真烂漫很快就暴露了艺术界的矫揉造作。

sentences.en: His most enduring quality is his childlike innocence.
sentences.cn: 他最具持久魅力的特质就是他那孩子般的天真无邪。

sentences.en: I am convinced of her innocence.
sentences.cn: 我坚信她是清白无辜的。

sentences.en: I liked children, loved their innocence and their inquisitiveness.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢孩子，喜欢他们的天真与好奇。

sentences.en: Nowadays that sort of innocence is in short supply.
sentences.cn: 现在那种天真烂漫很少见。

sentences.en: She could have established her own innocence and virtue easily enough.
sentences.cn: 她本可以轻易地证实自己纯真善良的品性。

sentences.en: she knew the gift had been chosen in all innocence.
sentences.cn: 她知道这件礼物是随意挑选的。

sentences.en: She repeated her protestation of innocence.
sentences.cn: 她再度强调自己是清白的。

sentences.en: The accused man proved his innocence of the crime.
The defendants, who continue to assert their innocence, are expected to appeal.
sentences.cn: 各被告仍然坚称无辜，预计会提起上诉。

sentences.en: The poet eloquently expresses the sense of lost innocence.
sentences.cn: 诗人动人地表达了失去天真的感觉.

sentences.en: There was a touching air of innocence about the boy.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩有一种令人感动的天真神情.

phrases.tran_cn: （对重要性或可能后果）一无所知

trans.tran_cn: 清白，天真无邪，无罪的人
trans.tran_en: the fact of being not guilty of a crime
